pre_caption_prompt:

pre_caption: The video features a smooth, aerial camera shot at a high angle, using deep focus with a large depth of field. The camera glides forward and tilts downward in a diving motion, smoothly passing over a hot air balloon. The landscape below reveals a snowy, forested area with winding roads, set in Levi, Arctic Circle, Finland.
